import React, { useEffect, useContext } from 'react' import useValue from '../../../hooks/useValue' import { Context } from '../../../context' const Time = () => { const [time, setTime] = useValue(new Date()) const { darkMode, setCalendarModal } = useContext(Context) useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => setTime(new Date()), 999) return () => clearInterval(interval) }, [time]) return (
Now on the clock
{time.toLocaleTimeString()}
) } export default Time
